tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been trying for baby since 2019. Undergone various treatments, laparoscopic surgeries but everything failed.  visited multiple doctors in Mumbai for second opinions but every-time I was more miserable as the only answer I got was UNEXPLAINED INFERTILITY. I had completely broken down and started having social stigma as always faced only one question when will you give good news? 

One of my distant relative recommended Dr Nutan Hegde to my mom. Frankly I had given up on mental peace, my mom said let‚Äôs please go here. I visited her in Dec 2022, conceived in Feb 23 and delivered a healthy baby in Oct 23.
She made me believe I am all good to conceive, she guided me positively on exercising, walking and most importantly diet. With mild  and few medicines she just made the magic happen. I feel fortunate enough to meet her and forever thankful to her for bringing in all the positivity without hurting my body with trucks of medicine. Unlike other doctors I never got a doctor vibe from her but more of a guide, philosopher and friend.

Would highly and always recommend her for any treatment as she makes things at ease for a patients and believes in getting positive results

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi 
It's Aarefa From Bandra East Mumbai.i have heart problem,n  after miscarriage I was unable to conceive naturally,some doctor advice IVF,but I want natural pregnancy,i treated so many hospitals in so many cities for infertility, I have bad experience of very bad treatment,coz it was expensive but it was hounted me.i was in depression coz I was not conceiving from 2years,i searched Google fertility clinic near me,then i found The Legend Nutan Pyari Mam.she is super friendly,super magical doctor.in only 1 n half month I got conceived naturally.i have heart problem it was risky preg but she cares best treat best all are...
Actually she is not just doctor she is Super power women with God gift,i really love you mam.... Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏èüôè‚ù§Ô∏èüôè‚ù§Ô∏èi recommend every one for any problem madam can cure it,she is such nice genuine doctor.
She helps me to manage my stress,how to calm ur self.coz some time tension stress are big reason to infertility,but madams treatment is like Munnabhai zappi wala real touch wala treatment helps me easily concive in short period...
Thank you mam...love you ‚ù§Ô∏èüôè‚ù§Ô∏èüôè

tags: Wait time,
review:
Dr. Nutan is good for pregnancy 9 month treatment but not recommended for delivery...*** *** ** ******* ***** *** ****** *** *** **** ******.Dr. Always keep motivating me for normal delivery but at end when actual labour was there....she suddenly turn us for c section...
Labour pain **** ****** ** *** *** **** **** ****** ********* ******* ** ******* ****** * ****** **** ************ **** ** ***** *** ******* ****** **** ***** ********* ** *** *** ******************** overall Dr. Nutan is good for pregnancy 9 month treatment but not recommend her for delivery option
reply_text:
Thank you for your feedback.My most of the deliveries are normal. I motivate my patients from the very beginning for pelvic exercises so that they get into spontaneous labour.Every patient is explained about the process for normal and caesarean delivery and indications for caesarean delivery. I decided for caesarean after doing NST which ddnt look good and was explained to u and ur relatives. At that time I couldn‚Äôt even wait for a normal delivery as u were in early labour and would take 6-8 hours for full dilation and delivery. But it would jeopardise the baby‚Äôs condition. I had also explained to u about baby having passed motion inside which I saw during the Caesarean. It‚Äôs called foetal distress and this dirty fluid may get into baby‚Äôs lungs to cause infection.
I don‚Äôt push any patient for caesarean until there is a strong reason.
With respect to the hospital and facilities u were given a list of hospitals and choose accordingly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,
review: One word to describe is just not enough...Dr Nutan, is just outstanding and an Amazing Doctor! I sailed through a smooth pregnancy. Though I was more inclined towards a C-section rather than to go through labour but Dr Nutan ensured that I undergo a normal delivery.. All thanks to Dr Nutan. Post delivery also she was involved and concerned about baby and my health as well. She has been my GO-TO person for all issues (including finding a good pediatric) and has been guiding me till date through thick and thin. She is very approachable and friendly in nature. I am very happy to have found Dr Nutan, whom I can trust and connect with.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Nutan Hegde is a very professional and experienced. Her interactions with patients is very friendly and polite. Her diagnosis and treatment is very perfect. Being a first time mom, her advices on care and healthy pregnancy was of great help.My labour pain started at late mid night, she was on call with me throughout my journey till I was admitted to the hospital. She was there during my labour and delivered a healthy baby.Thank You for always being so nice and supportive throughout my journey of motherhood.

review: * ***** ********** *** ** *** ******* **** ******* ******* ** ** **** *** ****** ****** ** ********** ******* * ***** ******* ** ** ******** Didn't even bother to tell me if my treatment was over even after asking her this multiple times.  To anyone who is looking for a solution, she is definately not going to help you with that. I regret it. Utterly disappointed.
reply_text: I had seen you at my clinic for a consultation in May 2021. At that time you were completely treated for urinary tract infection.Since then you have been doing WhatsApp chats about all your problems and I have tried to guide you as much as possible without even charging you for the same. You were told to come back for a follow up if the symptoms were not better as further investigations were required. You never wanted to visit the clinic or do online consultation. Now after so many months you are writing a feedback saying that your treatment was incomplete just because I stopped the WhatsApp chats.
